pagecheckout-error-no-title: Error message when given title is invalid
pagecheckout-error-no-user: Error message when given user is invalid
pagecheckout-error-has-checkout: Error message when given page already has a checked-out
pagecheckout-error-save-failed: Generic error message when the checkout failed
pagecheckout-error-no-checkout: Generic error message when the currently checked-out page can not be checked in
pagecheckout-error-no-checkout-id: Error message when an invalid checkout was given on check-in
pagecheckout-error-db-insert: Generic error message when the checkout could not be saved in the database
pagecheckout-error-db-retrieve-inserted: Generic error message when the inserted checkout could not retreived from the database
pagecheckout-error-save-event: Generic error message when an event could not be saved
pagecheckout-lockdown-reason:
Extended permission error when the user is not allowed to perform an action on a page due to the page being checked out.
*$1 - Action, that the user tried to perform on the checked-out page.
*$2 - Username or Realname of the user, that the page is currently checkout-out to
pagecheckout-action-clear-label:
Label for link, that allowes to clear the checkout for the current page.
{{Identical|Clear checkout}}
pagecheckout-ui-clear-confirm: Confirmation message that asks the user if the user really wants to clear the checkout-out of the current page and warns the user, that this will make page editable for all normally eligible users
log-name-pagecheckout:
Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type.
{{Identical|Page checkouts}}
log-description-pagecheckout: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logentry-pagecheckout-checkin:
Log message about a user, that checked-in a page for a user
*$1 - Realname of the user, that checked-in a page for a user
*$2 - Username of the user that checked-in a page for a user. Use GENDER
*$3 - Name of the page, that was checked-in by the user for a user.
*$4 - Realname of the user, the page was checked-in for
logentry-pagecheckout-checkout:
Log message about a user, that checked-out a page for a user
*$1 - Realname of the user, that checked-out a page for a user
*$2 - Username of the user that checked-out a page for a user. Use GENDER
*$3 - Name of the page, that was checked-out by the user for a user.
*$4 - Realname of the user, the page was checked-out for
pagecheckout-alertbanner-checkout:
Message in the banner on top of the page, that is currently checked-out for a user
.*$1 - Username of the user, the page is currently checked-out for. Use GENDER
*$2 - Realname of the user, the page is currently checked-out for.
pagecheckout-alertbanner-checkout-with-c:
Message in the banner on top of the page, that is currently checked-out for a user, when comment is available.

*$1 - Username of the user, the page is currently checked-out for. To be used with GENDER.
*$2 - Real name or display name of the user, the page is currently checked-out for.
*$3 - Comment
page-checkout-workflow-activity-checkout: Message in the banner on top of the page, that is currently checked-out, in case a generic checkout is set, due to a running workflow
Comment on the checkout entity, when workflow checks the page out
page-checkout-workflow-clear-checkout: Comment text when page is checked-in due to workflow abort
